questions.question_text:
Currently, when support reps at Ursa Major Solar close a case, they manually send an email notification to the customer. The support manager would like to automate this process, as too many reps are forgetting this step.
Which two settings should the administrator use to meet this request? (Choose two.)

choices.A: Add the Knowledge component to the closed layout
choices.D: Auto-response rule step set for status of closed
choices.C: Case close template in the support settings
choices.B: Notify contact checkbox on close page layout

choices.A: Validation rules, Assignment rules, Escalation rules, Auto-response rules
choices.B: Validation rules, Escalation rules, Workflow rules, Auto-response rules
choices.C: Assignment rules, Auto-response rules, Workflow rules, Escalation rules
choices.D: Assignment rules, Validation rules, Workflow rules, Escalation rules

questions.question_text: What is the order of execution when a Case record is saved?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct.

questions.question_text:
Ursa Major Solar provides a 1-year warranty on all of the panels it installs. Installation details, along with the warranty information, are captured on a custom object called Installation. The installation record is created by the installer from the mobile app. Customers sometimes receive a longer warranty as a way of increasing customer satisfaction when an installation gets delayed or has issues.
How should the administrator configure Salesforce to capture the expiration date of the warranty?

choices.C: Use a formula as the default value of the warranty Expiration Date field.
choices.A: Include the warranty Expiration Date field on the mobile page layout.
choices.D: Create a formula field to display 1 year from the warranty purchased.
choices.B: Add a validation rule to ensure the Expiration Date field is populated.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is the correct one.

questions.question_text:
At Ursa Major Solar, a flow is in place that sends a reminder email 30 days before the warranty expiration date. A customer renews their warranty for another three years.
What is the expected behavior of the email element in the flow?

choices.B: The email is locked in the job queue until it meets the criteria.
choices.A: The email is not sent because the customers email address was missing.
choices.D: The email is sent with the 30 day reminder criteria.
choices.C: The email is not sent because the record no longer meets the criteria.
Add the email action to the page layout.
choices.D: Enable the creation of recurring tasks.
choices.A: Use a process email alert on the account.
